```{r setup, include=FALSE, Load data and clean}

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(xlsx)
library(dplyr)
library(ggpubr)
library(ggsci)
library(rstatix)
library (cowplot)

#Load data
All_data <- read_excel("FHS_Database_2020 Final.xlsx", sheet = 1)

#Remove unwanted columns
drops <- c("Visit","Intervention", "Comments")
All_data <- All_data[ , !(names(All_data) %in% drops)]

```

``` {r, Split data}

All_data_split <- mutate(All_data, "Liver fat" = if_else(All_data$`IHTG_%`<=5.56, "Low","High"), "Insulin" = if_else(All_data$`Insulin (umol/L)`<=11.2, "Low","High"))

All_data_split_df<- as_tibble(All_data_split)

```

``` {r, tablulate!}

All_data_split_df %>% group_by(`Liver fat`) %>% summarize(Age = median(Age), BMI = median(BMI))

```
